banner.title: Where every cryptocurrency tells an adventure story. Join us at the forefront of the travel revolution and discover a world of possibilities, your journey, your currency, your Tour Coin.

section_1.title_1: What is a Tour Coin and how does it work?
section_1.title_2: How to buy and use Tour Coin?
section_1.text_1_1: Tour Coin is a decentralized cryptocurrency designed specifically for the tourism industry, a type of digital money that revolutionizes your travel experiences. Powered by blockchain technology and backed by the robust Binance network, it is used for purchases, payments, and value storage.
section_1.text_1_2: Tour Coin gives you the freedom to explore the world in a unique and secure way.
section_1.text_2_1: Users can acquire Tour Coin through cryptocurrency exchanges or directly from the PancakeSwap platform. Once acquired, Tour Coin are stored in a digital wallet such as MetaMask.
section_1.text_2_2: By using Tour Coin, travelers can enjoy an innovative approach to making payments and transactions in the tourism industry, providing a smoother and more rewarding experience. Travel, smile, and pay with Tour Coin. Happiness is found in every Tour Coin you own.

section_2.p_1: This cryptocurrency offers you the best benefits

card_1.title: Tokenization of Tangible Assets
card_1.text: Our company tokenizes tangible assets such as properties, tourism services, and commercial establishments. This allows investors to access investments in the thriving tourism sector in Celso Ramos, Brazil, in a more accessible and diversified way.

card_2.title: Transparency
card_2.text: Security tokens are issued on a blockchain, providing a public ledger. This ensures transparency in token management and allows investors to easily audit transactions and share issuances.

card_3.title: Appreciation
card_3.text: The growing demand for Tour Coin in the tourism sector may result in potential appreciation of the cryptocurrency, offering attractive investment opportunities.

card_4.title: Borderless Travel
card_4.text: Traveling has never been easier! Tour Coin eliminates barriers in international payments, allowing you to enjoy your travels without worrying about exchange rates and bank fees.

card_5.title: Discounts
card_5.text: Simply load your Tour Coin into your digital wallet and unlock a wide range of travel experiences. Use your coins with our partnerships and enjoy exclusive discounts.

card_6.title: Voting Rights and Dividends
card_6.text: Our security tokens can be designed to grant investors voting rights and dividends, similar to common stocks. This gives investors an active role in business decisions and potential regular income streams.

section_3.title: A glimpse into the future
section_3.text_1: Facilitating happy and worry-free travel experiences by offering a unique cryptocurrency, Tour Coin. We want to be the key that unlocks unforgettable moments and smiles at every destination.
section_3.text_2: Revitalizing joy in travel through Tour Coin, becoming the currency of happiness for exploring the world.
section_3.text_3_1: ✔ Happiness First: We place the traveler's joy at the center of our actions.
section_3.text_3_2: ✔ Financial Empowerment: We provide freedom and happiness through secure and transparent transactions.
section_3.text_3_3: ✔ Human Connection: We seek to enrich people's lives by connecting them with authentic experiences.

section_4.title: Some lived experiences
section_4.p_1: We offer agile and personalized attention, supported by the experience and technical capacity of a specialized team.

section_5.title: Tour Coin release date
section_5.p_1: Tour Coin will officially go on sale on April 5th at 9:00 PM.
section_5.p_2: Happiness is found in every Tour Coin you own! Experience innovative and exciting travels with our unique currency. With Tour Coin, the whole world is at your fingertips. Invest in your happiness and explore new horizons with us! #UnlimitedTravel #InnovativeTravel
